text: Tormod Kåre Knutsen (7 January 1932 – 23 February 2021) was a Norwegian Nordic combined skier. He won the Nordic combined event at the 1964 Winter Olympics, and came second at the 1960 Winter Olympics. He won four national championships, and in 1960. Knutsen was born in Eidsvoll, Norway. Knutsen died in Eidsvoll on 23 February 2021, aged 89.OL-helten Tormod Knutsen er død ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Norway Category:Olympic gold medalists for Norway Category:Norwegian skiers
title: Tormod Knutsen
